attributes.action: National Service for all uk citizens from the age of 18 to 20
attributes.additional_details: We call for the return of national service for all uk citizens, from the age of 18 to 20. With the intention of giving young people an education in respect and disipline. We believe this will not only give a, misdirected generation some order and sense of community. But will also aid our underfunded and stretched armed forces
